about_the_game:
What's up guys, It's Quandale Dingle here.



*WUIHIHIHI*

I managed to communicate with the creator of Ultimate Ragdoll Game.

*WHAT*

He promised to make a free extension for his latest masterpiece.

*WHATAF*CK*

It will replace all the boring sounds in the game with top-quality goofy ahh sounds, including:

  • Fart sounds
  • Viral vine sounds
  • Cartoon sounds
  • Cursed sounds

*WOOOOO*
detailed_description:
What's up guys, It's Quandale Dingle here.



*WUIHIHIHI*

I managed to communicate with the creator of Ultimate Ragdoll Game.

*WHAT*

He promised to make a free extension for his latest masterpiece.

*WHATAF*CK*

It will replace all the boring sounds in the game with top-quality goofy ahh sounds, including:

  • Fart sounds
  • Viral vine sounds
  • Cartoon sounds
  • Cursed sounds

*WOOOOO*

name: Ultimate Ragdoll Game - Goofy Ahh Sounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7; 64-Bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11; 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: Ultimate Ragdoll Game - Goofy Ahh Sounds is a free game extension that replaces basic in-game sounds with noises from your favorite memes.
